title: Namechain is a Layer 2 designed for onchain identity
caption: Built for everyone tired of addresses, numbers, and complexity. Namechain lets users and developers create onchain identities through the power of names, not numbers.

accessible.title: Making ENS accessible to more people
accessible.caption: We're taking our knowledge from the last 7 years at the frontier of web3 naming to re-envision the architecture from the ground up on L2 By utilizing L2s, we're excited to make ENS more accessible to a wider range of users.

gas.title: Lower Gas Costs
gas.text: Layer 2 reduces gas fees, making .eth registrations and renewals cheaper and faster.

control.title: Enhanced Control
control.text: ENSv2 gives each .eth name its own registry, offering more flexibility and control.

multichain.title: Improved Multi-Chain
multichain.text: Layer 2 enables seamless .eth name use across blockchains with trustless connections.

learn-more.title: Want to learn more?
learn-more.caption: If you’re interested in learning more and building on Namechain, join the ENS Developer Telegram.

l2.title: L2 partner announcement
l2.caption: We’re announced that we’re partnering with _____! Watch Nick’s ___ presentation to see the full announcement.

ensv2.title: ENSv2: An Update on our Progress
ensv2.caption: This update aims to be informative and slightly technical, allowing you, the ENS community, to stay connected with our progress.

nextgen.title: ENSv2: The Next Generation of ENS
nextgen.caption: Our vision for the next iterations of the ENS protocol, on L2.
